results.name: Matrix (1,x)-(x,x^2) in Riordan array notation.
comment: Row sums are 1,0,1,0,1,0... Diagonal sums are A115360. Inverse is A115361.
formula: Number triangle T(n, k)=if(n=k, 1, 0) OR if(n=2k+1, -1, 0).
program: (PARI) tabl(nn) = {T = matrix(nn, nn, n, k, n--; k--; if ((n==k), 1, if (n==2*k+1, -1, 0))); for (n=1, nn, for (k=1, n, print1(T[n, k], ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 28 2015
